00036 #ifndef ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_
00037 #define ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "PetscVecTools.hpp"
00040 
00045 class AbstractTimeAdaptivityController
00046 {
00047 private:
00048 
00050     double mMinimumTimeStep;
00051 
00053     double mMaximumTimeStep;
00054 
00063     virtual double ComputeTimeStep(double currentTime, Vec currentSolution)=0;
00064 
00065 public:
00066 
00073     AbstractTimeAdaptivityController(double minimumTimeStep, double maximumTimeStep)
00074         : mMinimumTimeStep(minimumTimeStep),
00075           mMaximumTimeStep(maximumTimeStep)
00076     {
00077         assert(minimumTimeStep>0.0);
00078         assert(maximumTimeStep>0.0);
00079         assert(minimumTimeStep < maximumTimeStep);
00080     }
00081 
00083     virtual ~AbstractTimeAdaptivityController()
00084     {
00085     }
00086 
00093     double GetNextTimeStep(double currentTime, Vec currentSolution)
00094     {
00095         double dt = ComputeTimeStep(currentTime, currentSolution);
00096         if (dt < mMinimumTimeStep)
00097         {
00098             dt = mMinimumTimeStep;
00099         }
00100         if (dt > mMaximumTimeStep)
00101         {
00102             dt = mMaximumTimeStep;
00103         }
00104         return dt;
00105     }
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif /*ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_*/
